title: Mercur
resume:
A fictional inspired by reality, telling the story of Radio Mercur, the start, as it best and is fall.
A story of an illegal radiostation with brodcasted from ship, a story of the diffrent person involed in the radio in the age 1958-1962 where radio mercur, broadcastede due to a law fall not conercering broadcasting from sea.
